# **26189680 | AvivRegev | Cell | 2015 | BMDCs | TNF**
## Overview 
**PMID**: 26189680<br />
**Model**: Bone marrow derived dendritic cells (BMDCs)<br />
**Treatment**: Tumor necrosis factor (TNF) high<br />
**Control**: Tumor necrosis factor (TNF) low<br />
**Type**: Sorting <br />
**Description**: CRISPR screen in mouse bone marrow derived dendritic cells (BMDCs) and sorted with TNF high vs. TNF low conditions. Positive values indicate genes whose knockout can increase TNF protein expression level.<br />
